welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Al Hamalah, a charming city located in the Kingdom of Bahrain. Known for its beautiful beaches and rich culture, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Sakhir Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bahrain International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bahrain International Airport, primarily used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 4 hours by registering with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting 'KAIA Free WiFi' and following the instructions.
